FuncDef:
The value-added-service policy command creates a value added service policy or enters the view of an existing service policy.
The undo value-added-service policy command deletes a value added service policy.
By default, the value added service policy is not created.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a service policy.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 characters.

Indicates the destination address accounting service type.
-

Examples: Info: Create a new value-added-service policy.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The value-added-service policy command is used to configure a value-added service policy template or enter the view of an existing service policy.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
In the view of creating a new policy, this command must carry the parameter daa or bod. Such parameters do not need to be carried in the view of a created policy.
